Books.BookDescription: An epic historical novel following Korean immigrannts living in Japan at the start of the 20th century, exploring the effects of poverty, abuse, war on multiple generations.
A multi-generational saga that follows the descendants of two half sisters, Effia and Esi, across three centuries, beginning in eighteenth-century Ghana and arriving at the present day.
A story of a young, college-educated black man struggling to survive and succeed in a racially divided society that refuses to see him as a human being.
An intricate mosaic of African-American women livin in the South, joined by their love for each other, the men who abuse them, and the children they care for.
A journey of a father and his young son across a landscape blasted by an unspecified cataclysm that has destroyed most of civilization and almost all life on Earth.
An odyssey alternating between a teenage boy in search of his mother and an aging simpleton who never recovered from a wartime affliction.
